Allow the users to create a new user whe.other: 允许用户在共享文件夹时创建新用户

Allow to search users from other groups.other: 允许通过自动完成从其他组中搜索用户 (如果先前的选项设置为 false) 并与他们共享工作区

Default start repository.other: 登录后显示的默认工作区。“主页”是带有活动和搜索引擎的欢迎页面。

Do not load groups and users list if no.other: 如果没有输入正则表达式，请不要加载组和用户列表。避免在 LDAP 上发送大规模搜索。

If previous option is set to True, direc.other: 如果之前的选项设置为 True，直接显示来自所有组的完整用户列表

If set, this action will be triggered au.other: 如果设置，此操作将在用户登录时自动触发。 可以登出(锁定用户)、密码更改(强制密码更改) 或其他任何内容

If the 'guest' user is enabled, remember.other: If the 'guest' user is enabled, remember her preferences accross sessions.

Image displayed next to the user name.other: Image displayed next to the user name

Let user create repositories from templa.other: 允许用户从模板创建资源库

List of parameters to be edited when cre.other: 创建新共享用户时要编辑的参数列表。

Maximum number of shared users per user.other: 每个用户的最大共享用户数

Maximum number of users displayed in the.other: 用户自动完成时显示的最大用户数

Minimum number of characters to trigger.other: 触发自动完成功能的最小字符数

Sets how the application core data (user.other: Sets how the application core data (users,roles,etc) is stored.

Share with existing users from all group.other: Share with existing users from all groups

Simple SQL Connexion definition that can.other: Simple SQL Connection definition that can be used by other sql-based plugins

Some roles should be disappered in the l.other: Some roles should be disappered in the list.  list separated by ',' or start with 'preg:' for regex.

Some roles should be shown in the list..other: Some roles should be shown in the list.  list separated by ',' or start with 'preg:' for regex.

Users completer min chars.other: 用户自动完成最少字符

Users only (do not list groups nor roles.other: Users only (do not list groups nor roles)
